channel.title: bad on Alex's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in bad on Alex's Blog

item.title: Bad words list (458 words)
item.description: Are you creating a new forum, IRC channel, or pretty much any kind of website where users can submit links and you need to control bad words? Well I was in that situation a few days ago, and it took a very long time until I managed to find some resources, so here I'll try to post a bad words list that I'll keep on building on as I find more sources.
